The Schiller stone The Tell's Chapel on the way to Flüelen Baroque church of Wassen Once you arrive in Flüelen, the Gotthard Panoramic train will be waiting for you. On you get and off you go. Before passing through the tunnel, you will ride by a very special building. The "Chileli vo Wasse", a little church that's iconic to the Gotthard line. This little church in the village of Wassen, commonly known as „Chileli vo Wasse“, sits on a hill and can be seen from three different angles on the way up to the former Gotthard tunnel.
